body:
Closes #11875.

- as detailed in the issue - the original packaging with openfoam as a
  virtual and with openfoam-com being a provider, as well as the
  openfoam-org and openfoam-extend forks, adds an obfuscation layer
  without any benefit.

  Removing old 'openfoam-com' packages may be temporarily impeded
  by #11870, but the issue #11875 also documents a workaround.
title: CONFIG: openfoam package renaming
